title: Wanna Rewind? Plan this trip!
description: New Zealand's largest island is a haven for outdoorsy types. Whether you're hiking around turquoise Lake Tekapo, bird-watching on the Otago Peninsula, stargazing from the University of Canterbury Mount John Observatory and exploring Mount Cook. Plus, because of the country's low crime rate, New Zealand is a top destination for solo female travelers.

title: Bora Bora is that dream.
description: Travelers searching for a once-in-a-lifetime vacation should head to this dreamy French Polynesian island for its romantic overwater bungalows, luxe spas and stunning white sand beaches. Bora Bora is a boater's dream - whether it be sailboats, glass-bottom boats, speedboats, kayaks, Jet Skis or more, the island has it all. Whether you just want to admire the views on a sunset cruise or prefer a more active outing freediving in the lagoon's aquamarine waters, there are a variety of operators offering excursions to suit every type of traveler.

title: A glimpse of breathtaking scenery.
description: Visitors travel from around the world to catch a glimpse of Tahiti's beautiful natural scenery, which features everything from tumbling waterfalls to soaring mountains. Away from the beach, travelers can stroll through the capital city of Papeete, explore Tahiti's sister island, Moorea, or unwind at one of the island's extravagant resorts.

title: Absolute Picture-Perfect views
description: Paris is undoubtedly the beating heart of France, filled with highly regarded museums, monuments and churches.

title: What is a trip with the best shopping malls?
description: History buffs can step back in time at the Tower of London, while foodies eat their way through the Borough Market. Because there are endless things to do in this U.K. metropolis, you'll want to book a sightseeing tour to optimize your time. London's high hotel prices can make travelers with tight budgets cringe. Book your accommodations far in advance for a good discount.

title: Barcelona cruise.
description: Barcelona, Spain's diverse architecture sets the city apart from other European destinations. Great destination for Family time, relax on La Barceloneta beach, take a sample of the tasty local tapas at Boqueria Marketor sip sangria along Las Ramblas. Food is a perfect way of bonding.

title: Adventure time.
description: Argentine Patagonia is a treat for all travelers, not just those with a penchant for adventure. From its diverse wildlife  (such as Magellanic penguins, Andean cats and southern elephant seals) to its majestic Andes Mountains and jaw-dropping glaciers, this region showcases Mother Nature at its best. Most amateur of photographers will appreciate the palette of incredible colors on display here. Can't-miss places include the Argentine Lake District, Mount Fitz Roy and the Perito Moreno Glacier
activity: Hiking, Star Gazing, Bird Watching, Swimming

title: Take a risk for exploraton.
description: Reaching this remote national park in Chilean Patagonia isn't easy, but beholding the ice fields of Grey Glacier and the soaring peaks of the Cuernos del Paine are more than worth the trip. And with 448,000-plus acres of diverse land to explore, visitors will find boredom near impossible in this once-in-a-lifetime destination.

title: Find your Peace.
description: Overlooking the Caribbean Sea, Belize offers scenic shorelines, unique wildlife and some of Central America's best dive sites and the warmest feeling sand beaches suitable for lovely nights with heart to heart talk with your significant other or a serene atmosphere for deep thoughts and emotional decisions or a place to find your peace.
activity: Relaxation, Sight Seeing, Exploring Marine reserves

title: Enjoy dance like never before.
description: Mauritius appeals to vacationers in search of a bit of everything. Though its main draws are its powdery sands and luxe beach resorts, this small island nation east of Madagascar also charms visitors with its mix of cultures; friendly locals; lively festivals and tasty teas and rums.
activity: Sight Seeing, Relaxation, Food exploration, Enjoying traditional sega dance performance

title: Visit an underrated vacation location and be beyond Wowed.
description: Despite its small size and landlocked location in southeastern Africa, Malawi draws visitors with its gorgeous lake, diverse wildlife and friendly people. For the best wildlife viewing, arrive during the dry season, which lasts from May to October. Experience NatGeo Wild in person.

title: Enjoy Victoria Falls at it's prime.
description: Outdoorsy types travel far and wide to admire this breathtaking UNESCO World Heritage Site. Victoria Falls is roughly twice as deep and wide as Niagara Falls, making it one of the world's most jaw-dropping waterfalls. To see this natural wonder at its prime, plan a visit in April or May when the region's rainy season has concluded. Book your trip now to admire the falls from a different angles.

title: Travel is the best love affair.
description: To the honeymooners, what is a better way to start your married life with your partner other than a romantic city that screams love? Book that honey moon trip with us and make your honey moon the perfect experience. Non-honeymooners, take this trip to Japan, why? Your possible life partner could be waiting for you!

title: Check off your bucket list with this fascinating destination
description: Tokyo Japan's capital features neon-lit skyscrapers and crowded streets that novice visitors may find dizzying, but its one-of-a-kind offerings can't be missed. Spend days exploring fascinating architecture or visiting Odaiba for its premier shopping scene. Or, take in some quieter, more peaceful moments at a holy site like the Temples, you don't want to miss the late night view of this city. It is the bucket list destination for foodies. Date nights could never have been better.
activity: Date nights, Food exploration, Sight Seeing, Honeymoon

title: Extremely modern but interested in culture? Book this trip!
description: From the moment you touchdown at Singapore Changi Airport (a tourist destination in itself), Singapore shows off its futuristic embellishment. But this Southeast Asia jewel is also unique for its amalgamation of cultures. This fusion takes form in the city's colorful neighborhoods, eclectic culinary scene and overall modern atmosphere.

title: Family Time.
description: With idyllic beaches and verdant parks, Maui offers ample opportunities to relax. Here, you can admire the stunning scenery as you cruise along the Road to Hana. Sampling Maui's seafood is also a must, but don't overlook other island delicacies like haupia, a creamy coconut custard.

title: Alexa, play Lost in Paradise
description: This tropical island is a sight to see with family and friends. Check off Big Island vacation experience with a visit to a native Hawaiian garden, beautiful waterfalls, and an active volcano. With easy pick up and drop off, your tour of this large Perfect island with exotic trees is stress-free.

title: Oahu is never a wrong choice
description: Oahu features a nice balance of urban and beach environments. And with pleasant weather year-round, there really is no wrong time to visit this Hawaiian paradise. There's a good chance a barrage of tourists will greet you.

title: Icebergs!
description: The shetland islands offer breath-taking views of ice sheets, icebergs and glaciers, and it is here where you can find thousands of penguins flocking around. The interior black sand beaches on the South Shetland Islands are also sites of several research stations and ancient whaling stations that you can pay a visit to.

title: See the beauty of Whales
description: From iceberg-clad waterways and passages to frequent polar expedition cruises, natural harbours and snowy islands, the Antarctic Peninsula is a wonder in itself. You can also soak in stunning views of towering glaciers, penguin colonies and various types of whales here, including the minke whale, humpback whale, killer whales and more.

title: Polar Life Exploration
description: The Drake Passage is home to the roughest seas in the world.  You are sure to experience the fear in your stomach from excitement, in addition to the choppy waves, huge gales of water and more
